Title: One Potato, Two Potato
Actors: Barbara Barrie, Bernie Hamilton, Richard Mulligan, Harry Bellaver
Plot: Study of interracial marriage in the 1960's. A white divorcée falls in love with and marries an African-American man. When her ex-husband sues for custody of her child, arguing that a mixed...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
